participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Lily is a creative and imaginative girl who enjoys expressing herself. She has a cheerful demeanor and is friendly, though she can feel a bit lonely sometimes.
participant_1.background: i don't have many friends. i hate school. i am a 12 year old girl. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

participant_2.name: Helen
participant_2.personality: Helen is a warm-hearted and nurturing grandmother who loves to share her life experiences. She has a positive outlook on life and enjoys storytelling.
participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i do not have a smartphone. i am retired and living the great life.

content.text: I want to be a clown like my dad. Do you hate school?
I am not sure what i do not like. Do you have many friends?
